715659f-a.text:
West 150th Street, north side, east from and including Convent Ave., to and including St. Nicholas Place. Building shown in the foreground, (421) at the N.E. corner of Convent Ave., is a frame house.
September 1, 1935.
L. Sperr.

719197f-a.text:
Convent avenue, from 150th to 152nd Streets, where it intersects St. Nicholas avenue, showing on the right No. 421 West 150th Street,which is a three-story frame house.
1932.
J. Clarence Davies Collection, Museum of the City of New York.
Negative No. 306
